column4: _Carrie_→ if i were you, i would watch the properties for the file in Totem. it will tell you which codec/format is used.
hotmonkeyluv→ the "route" command will tell you the IP of the current gateway you are using
can you specify how to use it? or wait...i'll check the man page
I only get 255.255.255.0, and the IP of one of the first router on my network, not the actual internet IP
